name: Stacky Chef
description:
Play as a chef and complete customer orders in this busy burger joint by catching the correct ingredients! Unlock upgrades to make more money and new recipes to please new customers! Unlock new outfits for chef by completing achievements and collecting coupons! Compete on a number of leaderboards as well as in a high pace, challenging Hardcore Mode!

Features:
- Simple and fun gameplay and touch controls
- Easy to learn and addicting gameplay
- 39 Restaurant & Recipe Upgrades
- 4 Prestige Levels
- 9 Chef Outfits
- 4 Leaderboards to compete on
- 9 Challenging Achievements
- Challenging Hardcore Mode

Rise to the top and become the ultimate Stacky Chef!
